overview:
Ryan Arriaga is the CEO and visionary of the way SeatNinja functions, where it plans to expand and how it accomplishes this.

At a younger age Ryan worked in the restaurant industry for some time and realized a huge problem that needed to be filled within the dining industry. Several years later after joining the Marines and acquiring sales and leadership skills from his day job he started developing SeatNinja. Ryan is a strong networker and has successfully brought together a strong team that compliments the vision of SeatNinja as an industry leader. Ryan oversees the design, functionality, hiring, investor relations and sales and marketing that fall in line with the vision of the company.
